thread.title: retweets clip of nip slip during Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen retweets clip of nip slip during Super Bowl | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.com
title: retweets clip of nip slip during Super Bowl
text:
Someone has an eagle eye.
An incredibly observant Super Bowl viewer noticed a brief moment during the broadcast when cameras caught Chrissy Teigen's nipple and tweeted a video of it, tagging the star and her husband in his post on Sunday.
And Chrissy, being the rock star that she is, retweeted the user's video with the comment, 'boom goes the dynamite.'
Scroll down for video
Game time: Chrissy Teigen's nipple was caught on camera as she watched the Super Bowl with her husband John Legend at Houston, Texas' NRG Stadium on Sunday night
How did he even see that? Chrissy retweeted a post by an incredibly observant Super Bowl viewer who noticed a brief moment during the broadcast when cameras caught her nipple and tweeted a video of it, tagging the star and her husband
Twitter user @chuckupthedusse was watching the Super Bowl at home when his laser vision picked up on something a little scandalous.
Chrissy, 31, who was sitting in the press box at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas with husband John Legend, 38, wore a sheer black blouse with a tan blazer over top to watch the New England Patriots take on the Atlanta Falcons.
Apparently right around the moment when television cameras found her and her main man, the blazer shifted just enough outside to reveal the side of her nipple in all its glory.
Oops! Apparently right around the moment when television cameras found her and husband John Legend, the blazer shifted just enough to reveal the side of her nipple in all its glory
The Twitter user whose profile identifies him as Chuck WIll, J.D., paused the broadcast and took a video of Chrissy's 'party hat' to share with the internet.
'Did anybody else catch this, or am I the only one?' the apparent law school graduate said from off camera, as he zoomed in on the model's nipple in the seven second clip.
In his tweet, he wrote, '@chrissyteigen @johnlegend U the press box ain't save you... [eyeballs emoji].'
Eagle eyes! 'Did anybody else catch this, or am I the only one?' Twitter user @chuckupthedusse said from off camera, as he zoomed in on the model's nipple in the clip
'Boom goes the dynamite!': Chrissy took it like a great sport, counting herself among one of his nearly 700 retweets, thus sending the post out to all of her nearly four million followers
The original post by @chuckupthedusse, who has less than 1,000 followers, had nearly 700 retweets and 1,600 favorites in four hours.
Chrissy took it like a great sport, counting herself among one of those retweets, thus sending the post out to all of her nearly four million followers.
In contrast, her retweet of the video got nearly five thousand retweets and over 24 thousand favorites in the same amount of time.
And that is why Chrissy Teigen owns the internet.
Lip service: Chart-topping singer John was later seen planting a kiss on his model wife's cheek
